tool_description: Analyzes kitchen layout dimensions and identifies available spaces for appliance placement, considering existing fixtures and traffic flow requirements.

existing_fixtures.description: Array of existing fixtures with positions (e.g., 'sink_north_wall', 'island_center')

error_messages: Invalid dimensions: All room dimensions must be positive numbers greater than 0
Ceiling too low: Ceiling height must be at least 7 feet for standard appliances
Room too small: Kitchen dimensions suggest insufficient space for standard appliances
usage: Provide kitchen dimensions and existing fixture locations to get analysis of available spaces for new appliances.

total_area.description: Total kitchen area in square feet

recommended_layout.description: Recommended kitchen layout type (galley, L-shape, U-shape, island)
